text: Racing with the Moon is a 1984 American romantic period drama movie directed by Richard Benjamin and starring Sean Penn, Elizabeth McGovern, Nicolas Cage, Crispin Glover, Dana Carvey, Pat Carroll, Michael Madsen, Oscar Quitak, Eve Brent, Barbara Howard. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 romantic drama movies Category:1980s teen drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies directed by Richard Benjamin Category:Movies set in California
title: Racing with the Moon
